name: Bossa Nova Ipanema
address: Rua Bulhões de Carvalho, 337, Rio de Janeiro 22081-000
description: Located 300 metres from the famous Ipanema Beach in Rio de Janeiro, Bossa Nova Ipanema features free WiFi access. Copacabana Beach is 300 metres from Bossa Nova Ipanema, while Rodrigo de Freitas Lagoon is 1,5 km from the property. The nearest airport is Santos Dumont Airport, 8 km from Bossa Nova Ipanema. Galeão International Airport is 20 km away.Read less

Stroll our resort's lush, landscaped grounds, set on a white-sand beach facing the tropical South Atlantic, flanked by Brazils towering mountains. Each of the 538 hotel rooms and suites at our Rio de Janeiro resort include Sheraton Signature Sleep Experience beds, as well as private balconies with partial or full ocean views. description: Ibis Rio de Janeiro Nova América is a modern hotel with products and services at a great value for money, where you will find delicious and diversified breakfast, 24/7 car park (extra fee), 24/7 bar area, restaurant for lunch/dinner, free WIFI, and the comfortable Sweet Bed specially made to offer even better nights of sleep. Small pets (up to 33 lb) are allowed (for an extra fee).accorhotels.com

name: Plaza Spania Boutique Hotel
address: Rua Muniz Barreto, 554, Rio de Janeiro 22251-090
description: Plaza Spania Boutique Hotel is situated in the Botafogo district in Rio de Janeiro, 260 metres from Botafogo Beach. This hotel offers a daily complimentary breakfast and Free WiFi throughout the property. Rooms are air conditioned and feature a minibar and a flat-screen TV with cable channels. Each room includes a private bathroom fitted with a shower. Extras include free toiletries and a hair dryer. There is a 24-hour front desk at the property. Full buffet breakfast is served daily from 06:00 to 10:00 Complex of Sports of Fluminense Football Club - Soccer Field is 1.1 km from Plaza Spania Boutique Hotel, while Cristo Redentor Statue is 2.8 km from the property. Santos Dumont Airport is 4 km away.

name: Janeiro Hotel
address: Avenida Delfim Moreira, 696, Rio de Janeiro 22441-000
description: Soaking up the breeze, right bang smack on the sand, arms flung wide open to the Atlantic, this is JANEIRO. Located in the middle of Leblon's marvellous beach-culture, we bring Rio's bossa vibe to life. Nature is a joyful accomplice. And what about that view? The Cagarras islands scatter across a horizon blue as far as the eye can see. No make-believe needed here. At night, the Moon beams, and in the distance, the lights of Vidigal glitter and dance like fireflies. Pure poetry for the eyes, woven into the urban effervescence of the city. The barefoot simplicity of the beach finds its way into the smallest of details; from the rooms to the food, the music to the art, all is an extension of the golden sands out front. We sway to no other rhythm but Rio's.iHotelier/iStay

name: ibis Rio de Janeiro Santos Dumont
address: Rua Marechal Camara 280 Centro, Rio de Janeiro
description: Perfect for those travelling to Rio de Janeiro for business or sightseeing, ibis Rio de Janeiro Santos Dumont offers spacious and comfortable bedrooms at a very affordable price. Bedrooms with hairdryer, air conditioning and WIFI, restaurant breakfast full of options to start your day well. Just 1km from Santos Dumont Airport, close to the subway. And what's more, your dog is welcome.accorhotels.com

name: Casajomo Art & Food B&b
address: 136 R. Laurinda Santos Lôbo, Rio de Janeiro 20240-270
description: CasaJOMO Art & Food B&B is situated in Rio de Janeiro and has a rooftop pool and mountain views. The property features pool and garden views, and is 1.6 km from Escadaria Selarón. Boasting family rooms, this property also provides guests with a picnic area. At the bed and breakfast, every unit has a desk. Featuring a private bathroom with a walk-in shower and bathrobes, units at the bed and breakfast also feature free WiFi, while some rooms have a terrace. At the bed and breakfast, each unit is fitted with bed linen and towels. Continental and American breakfast options with warm dishes, local specialities and pancakes are available each morning at the bed and breakfast. At casaJOMO Art & Food B&B, the family-friendly restaurant is open for dinner and specialises in African cuisine. A variety of wellness packages are available for guests to get rejuvenated in-house. Guests can keep up their exercise routines during yoga and fitness classes. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy walking tours nearby, or make the most of the garden. Municipal Theatre of Rio de Janeiro is 3.2 km from casaJOMO Art & Food B&B, while Modern Art Museum is 4 km from the property. The nearest airport is Santos Dumont, 4 km from the bed and breakfast, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Linx Galeão
address: Avenida 20 de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro 21941-900
description: Conveniently located only 500 m from Galeão - Tom Jobim International Airport in Rio de Janeiro, Linx Hotel has a 24-hour gym, pool and a bar. It is 15 km from central Rio. Free WiFi is available. The air-conditioned rooms feature a 32" LED TV with cable channels and a minibar. The private bathroom includes a hot shower. The daily breakfast buffet offers a variety of fresh fruits, breads and cold meats. Guests can also enjoy regional and international specialties, as well as a selection of drinks in the hotel’s restaurant. Linx Hotel International Airport Galeão also offers 24-hour free shuttle service and screens with flight hours. Guests can also benefit from the Mercato, a grab-and-go service for quick meals and snacks. It is set 17 km from Maracanã Stadium and 25 km from Copacabana.

name: Rede Andrade Lapa
address: Rua Riachuelo 242, Rio de Janeiro 20230-015
description: Situated in Rio de Janeiro, 1.5 km from Arcos da Lapa - Acqueduto da Carioca, Lapa features free WiFi throughout the property. All rooms at this hotel are air-conditioned and soundproofed and equipped with a TV, air conditioning and minibar. The bathrooms are private and equipped with a shower. At Go Inn Rio de Janeiro Lapa you will find a 24-hour front desk and room service. Guanabara Bay is 3.3 km from Go Inn Rio de Janeiro Lapa, while Botafogo Beach is 3.6 km away. The nearest airport is Santos Dumont Airport, 2 km away.

name: Verano Stay Flat Trab E Relax
address: Rua Escultor Sergio Camargo, 50, Rio de Janeiro 22775-033
description: No description found

name: Royalty Rio Hotel
address: Rua Barata Ribeiro 581, Rio de Janeiro 22051-001
description: Royalty Rio Hotel is set in the Copacabana district in Rio de Janeiro, 400 metres from Copacabana Beach and 7 km away from Sugarloaf Mountain. Guests can enjoy the on-site restaurant. WiFi is offered free of charge in public areas. Each room is soundproof and equipped with air conditioning, minibar, flat-screen TV with cable channels and a working desk. Every unit includes a private bathroom. Royalty Rio Hotel also provide guests with free toiletries and a hair dryer. You will find a 24-hour front desk at the property and a communal sauna. Christ the Redeemer is 14 km from Royalty Rio Hotel, while Siqueira Campos Metro Station is 400 metres away. The nearest airport is Santos Dumont Airport, 10 km from the property.

name: ibis Rio de Janeiro Botafogo
address: Rua Paulino Fernandes 39 Botafogo, Rio de Janeiro
description: ibis Rio de Janeiro Botafogo perfectly combines comfort and mobility. Standard bedrooms with extra bed for children up to 12 years old, WIFI and air conditioning. It is close to the subway and bus station, easy access to the main sights of the city, such as Copacabana Beach, Museu do Amanha, Maracana Stadium, Corcovado and Sugarloaf mountain. The neighborhood has a very busy nightlife, with bars and pubs.accorhotels.com

name: Mc Flats Ipanema Beach Star
address: Rua Prudente De Moraes, 729, Rio de Janeiro 22420-041
description: Situated one block from trendy Ipanema Beach, Mc Flats Ipanema is just 9 km from Santos Dumont Airport. Complete leisure facilities include an exclusive Maria Bonita Wellness Spa, modern gym and heated pool. The spacious apartments at Mc Flats Ipanema Beach Star have wooden furnishings and floors, and kitchenettes with a microwave and oven. Some have private balconies. Open for lunch, the Spazziano Restaurant serves a menu with organic dishes. For dining, several restaurants and bars are within a 10 minute walk from the hotel. Mc Flats Ipanema Beach Star is a 10-minute drive from Leblon Beach, and 20 km from Galeao Airport. It is also 20-minutes drive from Rio´s main bus terminal. Ipanema Beach Star offers both free Wi-Fi and complimentary parking.

name: Hangar Rio Hostel
address: Rua Cambauba 1087, Rio de Janeiro 21940-005
description: Hangar Rio Hostel is situated in the Ilha do Governador district in Rio de Janeiro, 11 km from Maracanã Stadium and 12 km from Joao Havelange Olympic Stadium - Engenhao. Guests can enjoy the on-site bar. Rio de Janeiro/Galeao International Airport is 4 km away. Certain units include a seating area for your convenience. Hangar Rio Hostel features free WiFi. There is a 24-hour front desk at the property. Baía de Guanabara is 13 km from Hangar Rio Hostel, while Cristo Redentor Statue is 15 km from the property.

name: Casa Tuxi
address: Rua Bambina 26, Rio de Janeiro 22251-050
description: Located in Rio de Janeiro, 700 metres from Botafogo´s tube station and the beach, Casa Tuxi features an outdoor pool and sun terrace. Guests can enjoy the on-site bistro. Free WiFi is available throughout the property. Each room at this guest house is air conditioned and has a flat-screen TV with cable channels. The rooms are fitted with a private bathroom. The property also offers a transfer service and a tour desk. Cristo Redentor Statue is 2.7 from Casa Tuxi, while the Sugar Loaf is 4.5 km from the property. The nearest airport is Santos Dumont Airport, 4 km from the property.

name: Pousadinha Copacabana
address: Rua Silva Castro 39, Rio de Janeiro
description: Offering a garden and quiet street view, Pousadinha Copacabana is situated in Rio de Janeiro, 700 metres from Copacabana Beach and 1.7 km from Leme Beach. Among the facilities at this property are luggage storage space and a housekeeping service, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The guest house has family rooms. Fitted with a terrace, the accommodation offers air conditioning and features a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with shower. At the guest house, units include bed linen and towels. Diabo Beach is 2.9 km from the guest house, while Rodrigo de Freitas Lake is 3.6 km from the property. The nearest airport is Santos Dumont Airport, 10 km from Pousadinha Copacabana.

name: Hotel Pousada Irmaos Freyhardt
address: Praça Amazônia, 618, Rio de Janeiro 21931-246
description: No description found

name: Villa Alexandrino
address: R. Alm. Alexandrino, 2671 - Santa Teresa, Rio de Janeiro 20241-263
description: Villa Alexandrino offers a spectacular view of the Guanabara Bay and is located in the charming district of Santa Teresa. Built in the late 19th century, high on a hill, with a swimming pool, beautiful staircases and frescos, this guest house is surrounded by lush greenery and tropical flora. Guests can enjoy a buffet breakfast each morning in the breakfast room or on the terrace. It includes a variety of fresh fruits, breads and cold meats, as well as a selection of hot and cold drinks. Free WiFi is provided. The spacious rooms at Villa Alexandrino boast antique-style décor and furniture. They feature an air-conditioner, wardrobe and some offer views. Other facilities include various lounge and reading areas. There is also a shared balcony with mountain and city views. Villa Alexandrino is located 3.5 km from the lively Lapa district, 8 km from Maracanã Stadium and 10 km from Copacabana Beach. The Santos Dumont Airport is only 5.5 km away. Private parking is free.

name: Pousada Cantinho do Joá
address: 680 Rua Presciliano da Silva Casa de pedra, Rio de Janeiro 22611-130
description: Featuring a bar, garden and views of lake, Pousada Cantinho do Joá is located in Rio de Janeiro, 300 metres from Joatinga Beach. The property is situated 350 metres from Barra da Tijuca, 3.3 km from Pedra Bonita and 6 km from Tijuca Forest National Park. The guest house features family rooms. At the guest house each room is fitted with a private bathroom. Guests at Pousada Cantinho do Joá can enjoy a buffet breakfast. Rio de Janeiro Botanical Gardens is 9 km from the accommodation, while Rodrigo de Freitas Lake is 10 km away. The nearest airport is Santos Dumont Airport, 17 km from Pousada Cantinho do Joá.

name: Santo Mirante Hostel
address: Rua Dias de Barros 54 - Fundos, Rio de Janeiro 20241-020
description: Located in Rio de Janeiro, 2.1 km from Flamengo Beach, Santo Mirante Hostel provides air-conditioned rooms and a terrace. The property is set 5.3 km from AquaRio Rio Marine Aquarium, 6.3 km from Museum of Tomorrow and 6.8 km from Maracanã Stadium. Free WiFi and a shared kitchen are featured. All units at the hostel are equipped with a private bathroom and bed linen. Popular points of interest near Santo Mirante Hostel include Escadaria Selarón, Municipal Theatre of Rio de Janeiro and Modern Art Museum. The nearest airport is Santos Dumont Airport, 3 km from the accommodation.

name: Reserva Pontal Beach
address: Estrada Do Pontal, 585 Bloco 1, Rio de Janeiro 22790-877
description: LUXURY APARTMENT FACING THE SEA OF RECREIO DOS BANDEIRANTES fully furnished with high quality furniture and utensils to offer maximum comfort to its guests. Full kitchen equipped with stainless steel stove, stainless refrigerator, stainless microwave oven, sandwich maker grill, espresso coffee maker, cold water filter, glassware, plates and cutlery, etc. Common Areas: Adult and Children's Pools Discovered, Cold Hydromassage, Hot Hydromassage, Sauna, Gourmet Space, Zen Space, Games Room, Gym, Elevator, Concierge, Children's Space, Etc.VRBO

name: Santa Vista Rio
address: Rua Dr. Júlio Otoni, 254, Rio de Janeiro 20241-400
description: On the Santa Teresa district, just a 20-minute drive from Botafogo Beach in Rio de Janeiro, Santa Vista Rio offers views of the Corcovado Christ Statue, Sugar Loaf Mountain and Guanabara Bay. It has free Wi-Fi and a rooftop swimming pool. The rooms at the Santa Vista Rio have a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a seating area and are equipped with air conditioning. Some categories offer a spa bath. Guests can relax by the outdoor swimming pool, which offers ocean and mountain views. The hotel is 10 minutes' drive from Maracanã Stadium and 8 km from Copacabana Beach.

name: Eco Pousada Estrelas da Babilônia
address: Rua Dona Alexandrina 216, Rio de Janeiro 22010-060
description: No description found

name: I Love Hostel Rio
address: 63 Rua General Padilha, Rio de Janeiro 20920-390
description: Set in Rio de Janeiro, I Love Hostel Rio features a garden, shared lounge, bar, and free WiFi throughout the property. The property is around 3.6 km from Maracanã Stadium, 5.5 km from AquaRio Rio Marine Aquarium and 6.5 km from Museum of Tomorrow. The accommodation offers a shared kitchen, a 24-hour front desk and currency exchange for guests. Certain rooms will provide you with a kitchen with a fridge, an oven and a microwave. A buffet, continental or American breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. Guests at the hostel will be able to enjoy activities in and around Rio de Janeiro, like hiking. Escadaria Selarón is 7.3 km from I Love Hostel Rio, while Municipal Theatre of Rio de Janeiro is 7.9 km away. The nearest airport is Santos Dumont Airport, 9 km from the accommodation.

name: pousada do rei
address: rua barros de alarcão 321, Itaguaí 23024-340
description: Situated in Pedra de Guaratiba, pousada do rei offers beachfront accommodation 48 km from Rio de Janeiro Botanical Gardens and features various facilities, such as an outdoor swimming pool, a terrace and a restaurant. The accommodation provides a shared kitchen and room service for guests. At the inn, rooms include a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. Pousada do rei offers some rooms with sea views, and rooms are fitted with a balcony. The rooms will provide guests with a fridge. Staff at the accommodation are always available to provide advice at the reception. The nearest airport is Rio de Janeiro/Galeao International Airport, 59 km from pousada do rei.

name: Hostel Maresias do Leme
address: 15 Ladeira Ary Barroso, Rio de Janeiro 22010-060
description: Boasting a bar, shared lounge and views of river, Hostel Maresias do Leme is situated in Rio de Janeiro, 350 metres from Leme Beach. Among the facilities at this property are a 24-hour front desk and a shared kitchen, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The accommodation features evening entertainment and a concierge service. At the hostel, rooms include a terrace. All rooms are complete with a shared bathroom and air conditioning, and certain rooms have a balcony. The rooms have bed linen. Hostel Maresias do Leme offers a continental or à la carte breakfast. Copacabana Beach is 650 metres from the accommodation, while Red Beach is 700 metres from the property. The nearest airport is Santos Dumont Airport, 10 km from Hostel Maresias do Leme.
